REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0845 reute d f BC-RICHMOND-HILL<RICH>, 03-09 0048

TEXT.TITLE: RICHMOND HILL<RICH>, RIVERHEAD END MERGER TALKS
TEXT.BODY: Richmond Hill Savings Bank and <Riverhead Savings Bank FSB> said they terminated their previously announced merger negotiations. The banks gave no reason for ending the talks, which began on January 14. Reuter
